name: Christmas Gift (Alvaron)
description:
While going to the last CoderDojo of the year with my son, I've taken on a challenge to make a 3 hour GameJam while they where learning Scratch projects

Because of the time of year, it became a Christmas themed collection/drop-off game with snowball fight mechanic.

Didn't have time to implement win/lose state, timer, snowball shooting or enemies. 3 Hours is short

ZQSD or Arrow keys to move ; shift to dash
Collect the gifts, drop in the chimney
